articles.title: De Goey sidelined for a week with ab injury - The Age
articles.description: Collingwood star Jordan De Goey has a mild abdominal strain and will be off the track for up to a fortnight.
articles.content:
Coincidentally two other Collingwood players - Mark Keane and recruit Reef McInnes - have both suffered the same finger tendon injury this off-season.
